expt_aim: Does the addition of similar words reversed around have the same meaning
sent2: I really enjoy going sailing with my father.
He thought the player was excellent.
All of the cookies were chocolate.
The movie was either funny or sad.
Two of the weekends were sunny.
The students were sometimes but not always tired.
sent1: I really enjoy walking in the woods alone.
I really don't like eating out at upscale places..
He thought the player was good.
Some but not all of the cookies were chocolate.
The movie was funny or sad.
Three of the weekends were sunny.
She liked but didn't love the shirt.
